title: CFL Flipped Blended Learning Course for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character recognition and understanding of simple greetings
context.additional_context: Customized simulation content for medical/legal/technical professionals' work environments

learning_goals: Construct conversations of three or more sentences using 300 essential vocabulary items at HSK Level 2 in job-related contexts
Achieve over 80% fluency in five or more role-plays per professional domain (medical/legal/technical) in VR simulations
Pass evaluations of Chinese report writing and presentation skills using digital collaboration tools during team-based projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
